title: D5 Support/Jng LF Duo/team
body:
Looking for a new duo partner (Diamond +) as my previous diamond 3 adc main can't play due do unfortunate circumstances.

I main Janna, Morgana, Thresh and Lulu but play all supports and a few unorthodox ones as well.

Please have a working mic and some form of comms programme.

Previous 5's experience was last season in high Diamond 3 team were we reached Diamond 2 promos. I work well in a team and keep a level'd head and can shot call with the jungler if needed.

Add me in game on Scyther Bot or on my smurf Scyther Bot Jr for more info or any questions you might have.

Thanks
